content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_fence_gate
inventory=[{"type": "totem_of_undying", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "bucket", "quantity": 5, "index": 13}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 52, "index": 22}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 29}, {"type": "jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "firework_star", "quantity": 9, "index": 37}]
thought: To craft jungle_planks, I need to place the jungle_log at slot 35 into the crafting grid. Since there are no other items in the crafting grid, I will place it in slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 35 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_fence_gate
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "totem_of_undying", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "bucket", "quantity": 5, "index": 13}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 52, "index": 22}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 29}, {"type": "firework_star", "quantity": 9, "index": 37}]
thought: Now that I have crafted jungle_planks, I need to move them to a free inventory slot (eg., 11). This will allow me to craft the jungle_fence_gate in the next step.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_fence_gate

Ok
act: move from slot 29 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_fence_gate
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "totem_of_undying", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "bucket", "quantity": 5, "index": 13}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 52, "index": 22}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 3, "index": 29}, {"type": "firework_star", "quantity": 9, "index": 37}]
